name: HSP_CLP_PROC_INFO
description: Stores information about the procedure codes for a given claim print record.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim print record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the procedure associated with this claim. Multiple procedures can be associated with this claim.

columns.name: PROC_CODE
columns.description: A procedure code on this claim.

columns.name: PROC_DATE
columns.description: The date for this procedure code.
